name: The Last Leviathan
description: The Last Leviathan is a physics-based, ship building and destruction sandbox. On your voyage to uncover where The Last Leviathan lies you will discover a world full of rival ships, mythical monsters, wrecked flotsam, physics-puzzles and hidden treasures.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64/32 bit Processor: Intel Core i5 (2.4Ghz Dual Core) or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Radeon HD 6750 / GTX 760 (1Gb VRAM) or better DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64/32 bit Processor: Interl Core i7 (4Ghz Quad Core) or better Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: 2Gb Dedicated VRAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
